thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Parques Reunidos Q1 Recurrent EBITDA Loss Narrows To 4.9 Mln Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Parques Reunidos Q1 Recurrent EBITDA Loss Narrows To 4.9 Mln Euros
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - PARQUES REUNIDOS SERVICIOS CENTRALES SA :
* Q1 REPORTED NET LOSS 30.4 MILLION EUROS VERSUS LOSS 23.6 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* Q1 RECURRENT EBITDA LOSS 4.9 MILLION EUROS VERSUS LOSS 5.3 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* Q1 LIKE FOR LIKE REVENUE 66.0 MILLION EUROS VERSUS 61.3 MILLION EUROS YEAR AGO
* ON TRACK TO MEET YEAR END TARGETS, 2018 CAPEX PLAN ON TRACK ‍​ Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
